description: abstracted image with central red circle emitting yellow points and downward-shining rays in a spotlight effect; blue circles around and intersecting red circle; bottom of image depicts red swirls with black and pink eye-like centers on a blue ground with white and black radiating arcs; blue ground at top with many variously-colored circles of varying sizes; grey flying saucer in URQ, glowing pink; verso: artist's handprints in red
signed: LRC in gold: Ionel Talpazan NYC. / 2008 | verso in white pencil: Artist Identity Talpazan Ionel / NYC.
title: Untitled [Yellow Solar Glow]
